title: Lambda Secrets Manager with ABAC
description: Use attribute-based access control (ABAC) to control access to a secret stored in Secrets Manager.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: In this pattern, we explore the use of [attribute-based access control (ABAC)](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/introduction_attribute-based-access-control.html) to enable access to a secret in [AWS Secrets Manager](https://aws.amazon.com/secrets-manager/) by an [AWS Lambda](https://aws.amazon.com/lambda/) function.

bullets.text: Securely retrieving secrets with AWS Lambda
Use AWS Secrets Manager secrets in AWS Lambda functions
